entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
